channel.title: If you cant add your server in server status cheker!
channel.description:
if you have done all the how to crate a server steps and you still cant add it on the server status cheker!
i have tryed this and i fixed it the only thing you need that you need a dns server its not ok if you have 1 dns server but you most have 2 dns server go to start:run:cmd:ipconfig/all and see if you have 1 or 2 dns servers if you dont have 2 so try to contact your adminstrator and say you need 2 dns server i dont know if it free or it cost money but mine was free
hope this helped! :)
100% made by me :)
